name: 26 Dress Up Games & Makeover
description:
Attention young girls! Do you want to be a top fashion stylist? There is a dress up contest out there.

Be a fashionista by winning all the 26 different levels. Lots of accessories and dresses to play with including hairstyles, tops, purses, jewellery, shoes, bags, sunglasses, etc.

To clear a level, score a minimum number of points by creating a perfect dress up look!

Are you ready?

Level 1: Bride Dress up
Level 2: College Dress up
Level 3: Dinner Date Dress up
Level 4: Emo Dress up
Level 5: Military Dress up
Level 6: Club Dress up
Level 7: Princess Dress up
Level 8: Red Carpet Dress up
Level 9: Shopping Dress up
Level 10: Halloween Dress up

HURRY GIRLS ...DRESS UP FAST!!!

Level 11: Cow girl Dress up
Level 12: Summer Dress up
Level 13: Autumn Dress up
Level 14: Beach Dress up
Level 15: Gym Dress up
Level 16: Luau Dress up
Level 17: Office Dress up
Level 18: Punk Dress up
Level 19: Pyjamas Dress up
Level 20: Rock star Dress up

THE FASHION CONTEST IS ABOUT TO GET OVER!

Level 21: Sports Dress up
Level 22: Spring Dress up
Level 23: Superhero Dress up
Level 24: Viking Dress up
Level 25: Warrior Dress up
Level 26: Winter Dress up

CONGRATULATIONS! YOU DID IT! YOU ARE A FASHIONISTA! HURRAY!!


FEATURES OF DRESS UP GAME FOR GIRLS ARE:

- Super fun dress up games for young girls.
- Totally free. No in-app purchases
- 26 challenging levels to unlock
- Save the finished dress up looks on your phone and set it as your girly wallpaper!

Download Now!
